name: 7EpicDays.com
description: Exclusive deals on recreation for men
overview:
By offering never-before-seen ‘deals’ on entertainment, products and services that are tailored specifically to guys ages 21-40 years, the site will be the only provider of deals that help guys claim at least seven days a year as epic. It also provides a gift resource for birthdays, bachelor gifts, Father’s day, graduations, and new dad or ‘pull’ presents.

For 358 days of the year, men work hard at being devoted fathers, supportive husbands and earning a living. 7EpicDays.com is calling on them to take the remaining seven days as their own and make them epic with unforgettable events, activities and travel. All of the offers on the site are brokered directly by 7EpicDays.com with guys in mind, and will be available through subscription only on the site.

7EpicDays.com will provide weekly updates to its deal offerings, regularly introducing new concepts and niche adventure options. The site currently offers a handful of professional baseball stadium batting practice tickets for teams across the country, as well as guided fishing trips and more.
